Deprecated API

Contents

  • Interfaces
  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldCustomizer
    Since 5.11 use BaggagePropagationCustomizer
    brave.propagation.Propagation.KeyFactory
    since 5.12 non-string keys are no longer supported
    brave.sampler.DeclarativeSampler.RateForMethod
    since 5.8, use DeclarativeSampler.ProbabilityOfMethod
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    brave.ErrorParser
    Since 5.12 Use Tags#ERROR or defer to ZipkinSpanHandler
    brave.handler.FinishedSpanHandler
    Since 5.12 use SpanHandler.end(TraceContext, MutableSpan, Cause) with SpanHandler.Cause.FINISHED
    brave.propagation.B3SinglePropagation
    Since 5.9, use B3Propagation.newFactoryBuilder() to control inject formats.
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation
    Since 5.11 use BaggagePropagation
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.Factory
    Since 5.11 use Propagation.Factory
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.FactoryBuilder
    Since 5.11 use BaggagePropagation.FactoryBuilder
    brave.propagation.SamplingFlags.Builder
    prefer using constants. This will be removed in Brave v6
    brave.sampler.ParameterizedSampler.Rule
    Since 5.8, use ParameterizedSampler.Builder.putRule(Matcher, Sampler)
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    brave.handler.FinishedSpanHandler.NOOP
    Since 5.12 use SpanHandler.NOOP
    brave.propagation.Propagation.B3_SINGLE_STRING
    Since 5.9, use B3Propagation.newFactoryBuilder() to control inject formats.
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    brave.baggage.BaggageField.getAll​(TraceContext)
    Since 5.12 use BaggageField.getAllValues(TraceContext)
    brave.handler.FinishedSpanHandler.alwaysSampleLocal()
    Since 5.12, set Tracing.Builder.alwaysSampleLocal(). Tip: the same TracingCustomizer that adds this handler can also also set Tracing.Builder.alwaysSampleLocal().
    brave.handler.FinishedSpanHandler.handle​(TraceContext, MutableSpan)
    Since 5.12 use SpanHandler.end(TraceContext, MutableSpan, Cause) with SpanHandler.Cause.FINISHED
    brave.handler.FinishedSpanHandler.supportsOrphans()
    Since 5.12 use SpanHandler.end(TraceContext, MutableSpan, Cause) with SpanHandler.Cause.ORPHANED
    brave.handler.MutableSpan.isEmpty()
    Since 5.12 use MutableSpan.equals(Object) against a base value.
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.current​(String)
    Since 5.11 use BaggageField.getByName(String) and BaggageField.getValue()
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.extraKeys()
    Since 5.12 use BaggagePropagation.allKeyNames(Propagation) instead.
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.Factory.create​(Propagation.KeyFactory<K>)
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.FactoryBuilder.addField​(String)
    Since 5.11, use BaggagePropagationConfig.SingleBaggageField.remote(BaggageField)
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.FactoryBuilder.addPrefixedFields​(String, Collection<String>)
    Since 5.11, use BaggagePropagationConfig.SingleBaggageField.Builder.addKeyName(String)
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.FactoryBuilder.addRedactedField​(String)
    Since 5.11, use BaggagePropagationConfig.SingleBaggageField.local(BaggageField)
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.get​(String)
    Since 5.11 use BaggageField.getByName(String) and BaggageField.getValue()
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.getAll()
    Since 5.11 use BaggageField.getAll()
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.newFactory​(Propagation.Factory, String...)
    Since 5.11 use BaggagePropagation.newFactoryBuilder(Propagation.Factory)
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.newFactoryBuilder​(Propagation.Factory)
    Since 5.11 use BaggagePropagation.newFactoryBuilder(Propagation.Factory)
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.set​(String, String)
    Since 5.11 use BaggageField.getByName(String) and BaggageField.updateValue(String)
    brave.propagation.Propagation.Factory.create​(Propagation.KeyFactory<K>)
    Since 5.12, use Propagation.Factory.get()
    brave.propagation.TraceContext.Builder.extra​(List<Object>)
    Since 5.12, use TraceContext.Builder.addExtra(Object)
    brave.propagation.TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.Builder.context​(TraceContext)
    Since 5.12, use TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.newBuilder(TraceIdContext)
    brave.propagation.TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.Builder.extra​(List<Object>)
    Since 5.12, use TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.Builder.addExtra(Object)
    brave.propagation.TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.Builder.samplingFlags​(SamplingFlags)
    Since 5.12, use TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.newBuilder(SamplingFlags)
    brave.propagation.TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.Builder.traceIdContext​(TraceIdContext)
    Since 5.12, use TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.newBuilder(TraceIdContext)
    brave.propagation.TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.create​(Boolean, boolean)
    Since 5.12, use constants defined on this type as needed.
    brave.propagation.TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.newBuilder()
    Since 5.12, use TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.newBuilder(TraceContext), TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.newBuilder(TraceIdContext) or TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.newBuilder(SamplingFlags).
    brave.propagation.TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.sampled​(Boolean)
    do not use object variant.. only set when you have a sampling decision
    brave.sampler.DeclarativeSampler.create​(DeclarativeSampler.RateForMethod<M>)
    since 5.8, use DeclarativeSampler.createWithProbability(ProbabilityOfMethod)
    brave.sampler.DeclarativeSampler.sample​(M)
    Since 5.8, use DeclarativeSampler.trySample(Object)
    brave.sampler.DeclarativeSampler.toSampler​(M)
    Since 5.8, use Tracer.startScopedSpan(String, SamplerFunction, Object)
    brave.sampler.ParameterizedSampler.create​(List<? extends ParameterizedSampler.Rule<P>>)
    since 5.8, use ParameterizedSampler.newBuilder()
    brave.sampler.ParameterizedSampler.sample​(P)
    Since 5.8, use ParameterizedSampler.trySample(Object)
    brave.Span.remoteEndpoint​(Endpoint)
    Since 5.0, use Span.remoteServiceName(String) Span.remoteIpAndPort(String, int).
    brave.Tracer.withSampler​(Sampler)
    Since 5.8, use Tracer.nextSpan(SamplerFunction, Object) or Tracer.startScopedSpan(String, SamplerFunction, Object)
    brave.Tracing.Builder.addFinishedSpanHandler​(FinishedSpanHandler)
    Since 5.12 add a span handler that implements SpanHandler.end(TraceContext, MutableSpan, SpanHandler.Cause) with SpanHandler.Cause.FINISHED
    brave.Tracing.Builder.alwaysReportSpans()
    Since 5.12, use ZipkinSpanHandler.Builder.alwaysReportSpans(boolean)
    brave.Tracing.Builder.endpoint​(Endpoint)
    Use Tracing.Builder.localServiceName(String) Tracing.Builder.localIp(String) and Tracing.Builder.localPort(int). Will be removed in Brave v6.
    brave.Tracing.Builder.errorParser​(ErrorParser)
    This is only used in Zipkin reporting. Since 5.12, use ZipkinSpanHandler.Builder.errorTag(Tag)
    brave.Tracing.Builder.spanReporter​(Reporter<Span>)
    Since 5.12, use Tracing.Builder.addSpanHandler(SpanHandler) with a ZipkinSpanHandler
    brave.Tracing.errorParser()
    This is only used in Zipkin reporting. Since 5.12, use ZipkinSpanHandler.Builder.errorTag(Tag)
    brave.Tracing.propagationFactory()
    Since 5.12 use Tracing.propagation() as non-string keys are unsupported.
